workshop_activity.intro_text: This week is about spending one-on-one time with your teen.

content_box.text:
Being a parent can be so hard. Sometimes it feels like our children never listen to us.

But science shows that spending just a few minutes each day of focused one-on-one time with your teen helps build trust and love.

Itâ€™s a time when you focus on them, without TV or phones. Let them lead what you do or talk about.

Talk together about ways to spend one-on-one time with your teen.

Feel like you have NO TIME and you are exhausted? Remember to also think of ways that don't take up extra time.

workshop_activity.outro_text: It may not have instant results, but it will make a difference over the long term. You are an amazing parent for trying this.
workshop_activity.outro_habit_text: Every time you do one-on-one time, mark your @global.parent_point to track your success

content_box.text_1: This week, can you try 5 minutes of one-on-one time with your teen every day that you can?
content_box.habit_text: Every time you do one-on-one time, mark your @global.parent_point to track your success
